name: Clean Cars for All - Fuel Cell Vehicle
description: $10,000 rebate to buy or lease new or used fuel cell car when trading in pre-2007 gas/diesel vehicle
fullDescription: The Clean Cars for All program also offers rebates for hydrogen fuel cell vehicles, providing another zero-emission option for Bay Area residents replacing older polluting vehicles.
whatTheyOffer:
- $10,000 rebate for fuel cell vehicle
- New or used fuel cell vehicles qualify
- Trade in pre-2007 gas or diesel vehicle
- Covers purchase or lease
- Zero emissions, hydrogen-powered
- Can combine with other incentives
howToGetIt:
1. Must live in Bay Area (9-county region)
2. Household income at or below 400% federal poverty level
3. Own a registered pre-2007 gas/diesel vehicle
4. Vehicle must be running and pass smog
5. Apply and get pre-approved BEFORE purchase
6. Trade in old vehicle and buy/lease fuel cell vehicle
address: 375 Beale Street, Suite 600, San Francisco, CA 94105
keywords: Clean Cars for All, BAAQMD, fuel cell, hydrogen, zero emission, trade-in, rebate, low-income, car replacement
